scripts.db-init: cd $(npm bin)/../..; echo 'Deleting db & logs'; rm -rf db; rm -rf log; mkdir db; mkdir log; echo 'Initializing db'; initdb -U postgres -D $(npm bin)/../../db; pg_ctl -D $(npm bin)/../../db -l $(npm bin)/../../log/postgres.log start; sleep 4; chmod 700 $(npm bin)/../../create_mini_spy.sh; $(npm bin)/../../create_mini_spy.sh;
scripts.db-reset: npm run db-stop; export NODE_ENV=development; npm run db-init; npm run db-start;
scripts.test-db-reset: npm run db-stop; npm run db-init; npm run db-start;
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test; npm run test-db-reset; $(npm bin)/sequelize db:migrate; mocha;
